title: Authors and Citation
text: Bruce (2023). procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {procedural: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface},   author = {Andrew Bruce},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/procedural/}, }

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/procedural")

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("0016070") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title          code  label                                     #>   <chr>    <chr>          <chr> <chr>                                     #> 1 1        Section        0     Medical and Surgical                      #> 2 2        Body System    0     Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves #> 3 3        Root Operation 1     Bypass                                    #> 4 4        Body Part      6     Cerebral Ventricle                        #> 5 5        Approach       0     Open                                      #> 6 6        Device         7     Autologous Tissue Substitute              #> 7 7        Qualifier      0     Nasopharynx

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("10D20ZZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title          code  label                           #>   <chr>    <chr>          <chr> <chr>                           #> 1 1        Section        1     Obstetrics                      #> 2 2        Body System    0     Pregnancy                       #> 3 3        Root Operation D     Extraction                      #> 4 4        Body Part      2     Products of Conception, Ectopic #> 5 5        Approach       0     Open                            #> 6 6        Device         Z     No Device                       #> 7 7        Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("2W0UX0Z") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title          code  label              #>   <chr>    <chr>          <chr> <chr>              #> 1 1        Section        2     Placement          #> 2 2        Body System    W     Anatomical Regions #> 3 3        Root Operation 0     Change             #> 4 4        Body Region    U     Toe, Right         #> 5 5        Approach       X     External           #> 6 6        Device         0     Traction Apparatus #> 7 7        Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("3E1938X") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title                code  label                                      #>   <chr>    <chr>                <chr> <chr>                                      #> 1 1        Section              3     Administration                             #> 2 2        Body System          E     Physiological Systems and Anatomical Regi… #> 3 3        Root Operation       1     Irrigation                                 #> 4 4        Body System / Region 9     Nose                                       #> 5 5        Approach             3     Percutaneous                               #> 6 6        Substance            8     Irrigating Substance                       #> 7 7        Qualifier            X     Diagnostic

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("4B01XVZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title             code  label                      #>   <chr>    <chr>             <chr> <chr>                      #> 1 1        Section           4     Measurement and Monitoring #> 2 2        Body System       B     Physiological Devices      #> 3 3        Root Operation    0     Measurement                #> 4 4        Body System       1     Peripheral Nervous         #> 5 5        Approach          X     External                   #> 6 6        Function / Device V     Stimulator                 #> 7 7        Qualifier         Z     No Qualifier

what: Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance
title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("5A02110") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title          code  label                                            #>   <chr>    <chr>          <chr> <chr>                                            #> 1 1        Section        5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Perfo… #> 2 2        Body System    A     Physiological Systems                            #> 3 3        Root Operation 0     Assistance                                       #> 4 4        Body System    2     Cardiac                                          #> 5 5        Duration       1     Intermittent                                     #> 6 6        Function       1     Output                                           #> 7 7        Qualifier      0     Balloon Pump

code: pcs("6A0Z0ZZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   position title          code  label                                #>   <chr>    <chr>          <chr> <chr>                                #> 1 1        Section        6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies #> 2 2        Body System    A     Physiological Systems                #> 3 3        Root Operation 0     Atmospheric Control                  #> 4 4        Body System    Z     None                                 #> 5 5        Duration       0     Single                               #> 6 6        Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier                         #> 7 7        Qualifier      Z     No Qualifier

what: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: Pivot data frame long format easy printing

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
code: long(df, cols = dplyr::everything())

title: Pivot data frame to long format for easy printing — long
text: df data frame cols columns pivot long, default dplyr::everything()

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: pcs(x)

title: Look up ICD-10-PCS Codes — pcs
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() pcs("0G9000Z") pcs("0016070") pcs("2W0UX0Z") pcs("2W20X4Z") pcs("2W10X7Z") pcs("2W10X6Z") pcs("2W1HX7Z") }
